article.label: apn
article.title: TechnoPark Corp. is an Official APN Partner
article.keywords: Amazon Web Services, Official APN Partner, Amazon partner, APN partner of Amazon
article.description: Technopark Corp. is among the first AWS Partners ever to gain public designation as a Standard Technology Partner.

text.p: TechnoPark Corp. have been an active user of Amazon Web Services (AWS) for the the last three years. In our software solutions we're actively using Elastic Beanstalk, S3, EC2/EBS, CloudFront, and other services of AWS. s3auth.com was one of the latest products developed and made public by our team.
A few days ago we were qualified by AWS as a Standard Technology Partner. This new title makes TechnoPark a reliable and trustable developer of your software projects.
